file_content.text: It's a relief to see you again, my lord.
Good to see you again, sir.
You're a welcome sight, hunter.
Impressive work on Darth Serevin, but he was just a prelude to Malgus the Betrayer.
I took the stealth fighter for a test flight, performed a full systems test. We can leave for Malgus's station on your mark.
Agony won't begin to describe Malgus's punishment for stealing the Emperor's throne.
The traitor will pay.
I'm sure you'll end his reign appropriately, my lord.
It's about time Darth Malgus faced a superior Sith.
I look forward to his death.
I won't keep you waiting, my lord.
Once you're close to the station, enter formation with other ships and land quietly in the hangars.
Approach the station carefully.
Yes, sir.
Take us in nice and easy, but if Malgus is on to us, get ready for a fight.
Be careful on our approach.
I will monitor all enemy transmissions.
Are those injuries going to interfere with your job?
Are you good to fly?
I've cleared a medical examination. Nothing short of death would keep me from aiding the Betrayer's fall.
Looks like you suffered some injuries when Serevin shot you down.
Are you badly hurt?
Nothing serious, thank you.
Stopping Malgus won't be easy.
Have no doubt. The Empire will succeed.
Now steel yourself. Time we destroy a false Emperor.
